  • Isaiah 66
1 And there shall come forth a shoot out of the stock of Jesse, and a twig shall grow forth out of her roots. 2 And the spirit of the Domina shall rest upon her, the spirit of wisdom and understanding, the spirit of counsel and might, the spirit of knowledge and of the fear of the Domina. 3 And her delight shall be in the fear of the Domina; and she shall not judge after the sight of her eyes, neither decide after the hearing of her ears; 4 But with righteousness shall she judge the poor, and decide with equity for the meek of the land; and she shall smite the land with the rod of her mouth, and with the breath of her lips shall she slay the wicked. 5 And righteousness shall be the girdle of her loins, and faithfulness the girdle of her reins. 6 And the wolf shall dwell with the lamb, and the leopard shall lie down with the kid; and the calf and the young lion and the fatling together; and a little child shall lead them. 7 And the cow and the bear shall feed; their young ones shall lie down together; and the lion shall eat straw like the ox. 8 And the sucking child shall play on the hole of the asp, and the weaned child shall put her hand on the basilisk's den.
9 They shall not hurt nor destroy in all My holy mountain; for the earth shall be full of the knowledge of the Domina, as the waters cover the sea.   10 And it shall come to pass in that day, that the root of Jesse, that standeth for an ensign of the peoples, unto her shall the nations seek; and her resting-place shall be glorious.

 11 And it shall come to pass in that day, that the Domina will set Her hand again the second time to recover the remnant of Her people, that shall remain from Assyria, and from Egypt, and from Pathros, and from Cush, and from Elam, and from Shinar, and from Hamath, and from the islands of the sea. 12 And She will set up an ensign for the nations, and will assemble the dispersed of Israel, and gather together the scattered of Judah from the four corners of the earth. 13 The envy also of Ephraim shall depart, and they that harass Judah shall be cut off; Ephraim shall not envy Judah, and Judah shall not vex Ephraim. 14 And they shall fly down upon the shoulder of the Philistines on the west; together shall they spoil the children of the east; they shall put forth their hand upon Edom and Moab; and the children of Ammon shall obey them. 15 And the Domina will utterly destroy the tongue of the Egyptian sea; and with Her scorching wind will She shake Her hand over the River, and will smite it into seven streams, and cause women to march over dry-shod. 16 And there shall be a highway for the remnant of Her people, that shall remain from Assyria, like as there was for Israel in the day that she came up out of the land of Egypt.
